content.raw:
Thanks for the list, Jackie. I don't have access to wafflebot from home, so I can't check all of this stuff today. I'll comment on the things I remember from yesterday.

The bounding box is indeed too large. Jackie's suggestion seems like a good thing to try.

I had the same confusion when the text changed next to the checkboxes. I don't think it's necessary to change the text based on checked state.
content.html:
Thanks for the list, Jackie. I don't have access to wafflebot from home, so I can't check all of this stuff today. I'll comment on the things I remember from yesterday.
